title: These Boards ruined the forums!
body: Before these boards, so much people went on the forums. Now, you post a thread and you get only 5 replies in a whole day. Good job rito. Killed the forum community.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Mesprit,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=2XJPhmBd,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-01-16T07:41:15.866+0000)
>
> i agree

What a search for such an old post. Alot of these summoners are gone (Or perma banned) LOL, but i do remember it. Was a hot topic (2-4 years ago).
I was expecting the other Necro lord not you :-0

1. A good deal of people (tbh only a few actually stayed in fact) left when Board was announced. Who is gonna make use of the Board when most of the regulars left?
2. The comment section does not encourage "discussions" but "leave a comment".
3. They separate the original sorting into 2, "New" and "Hot". For older users who wants to constantly switch between the two when it was one and worked well in the first place?
4. The subjective dislike of the colour scheme to some.
5. The default upvote sort.
6. The Board mod.

So yer.

1. Maybe this was Riot's plan all along. ***luminarte***
2. How incredibly pedantic of you sir.
3. Please refer to no.2. Why complain about added features that you're not forced to use. If you have no use for it, set it to the one you want and leave it there.
4. Eh. Colours have a huge impact on people. This is slightly pedantic but a valid point. This is why we need B.E.K. **Rito pls**
5. PEDANTIC.
6. If you're referring to Board Moderators why would they be any different to the Forum ones... unless they're removing things that Riot doesn't want on their boards in which case *Riot doesn't want it on their boards so don't post it.* If you mean something else then I don't understand.

Most of your points are such minor things that it takes way more effort to complain about them than it would to ignore them.

The fact that a lot of regulars left is the biggest issue the boards have, but seriously I don't understand why. What a bunch of children lel

Why can't I hold all these limes.

Boards are an improvement over the forum.

Somebody develop the 'Boards Enhancement Kit' already so everyone can make it look just like the forums and quit their ♥♥♥♥♥y whining.
You missed all the buzz a long while back. A lot of people just decided to leave and refuse to use the boards, or participate a lot less than before.
wrong there was no buzz a long way back. its the same since the change lel fail cakes gg. ( why fix something thats not broke )
